name: Sharon Kaye
description: Life is too short to be anything but happy. If you have got broken heart, it does not mean you have got broken life. If you have got broken dream, it does not mean you have got broken future. Everything in our hands. We are owners of our lives and we decide what we want to be like and what kind of life we want to live. We should never give up. Great things take time. Is not it great thing to find love?
